svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/8.8.0 Chrome/61.0.3163.100 Electron/2.0.2 Safari/537.36" version="9.4.6" editor="www.draw.io" type="device"><diagram id="1dfc0fc5-ad78-56c3-b7de-5bcc7f006e5d" name="monolithic-architecture"></diagram><diagram id="5bc5d662-4119-b3b4-dfb3-c79e117dd2c0" name="monolithic-split"></diagram><diagram name="soa" id="f8eec107-5875-9311-def7-6a1b03de06a7"></diagram></mxfile>
